          Basic implementation of FrameAttributes set.

          Active attributes, either normal or highlight.

protected  FrameAttributes ScrollFrame.normalAttributes

Methods in gov.nasa.worldwind.util.tree that return FrameAttributes
 FrameAttributes FrameAttributes.copy()
          Returns a new FrameAttributes instance of the same type as this FrameAttributes, who's properties are configured exactly as this FrameAttributes.

          Get the currently active frame attributes.

          Indicates the frame attributes used to draw the frame when it is highlighted.
